title: Wing Yee FT
text:
Wing Yee Football Team (), currently known as Wing Yee Property for sponsorship reasons, is a <a href="Hong%20Kong">Hong Kong</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club which currently competes in the <a href="Hong%20Kong%20First%20Division%20League">Hong Kong First Division</a>.
History.
Wing Yee joined <a href="Hong%20Kong%20Third%20Division%20%26quot%3BA%26quot%3B%20League">Hong Kong Third Division "A" League</a> in 2006–07 season by borrowing the league membership of HK City Athletics Promotion Centre Ltd. The team was promoted to <a href="Hong%20Kong%20Second%20Division%20League">Hong Kong Second Division</a> from <a href="Hong%20Kong%20Third%20Division%20%26quot%3BA%26quot%3B%20League">Hong Kong Third Division "A" League</a> after that season. 
In the 2008–09 and 2009–10 seasons, the team finished at 4th and 5th respectively in the Second Division.
On May 20 2021 they have fielded a strike partnership with a combined age of 111 this season.
Brazilian forward Detinho who is 47 years old, meanwhile his strike partner Koon Wing-Yee, who also happens to own the club, is 64.
